title: STK Atlanta location address and hours
statement: STK Atlanta is located at 1075 Peachtree St, NE, Atlanta, GA 30309 and operates Monday-Thursday 11am-11:30pm, Friday-Saturday 11am-12:30am, Sunday 10am-11:30pm.

citations.quote: Atlanta 1075 Peachtree St, NE Atlanta, GA 30309 404-793-0144 Opening Hours Monday – Thursday: 11am – 11:30pm Friday: 11am – 12:30am Saturday: 11am – 12:30am Sunday: 10am – 11:30pm
